name: John Chick
description: John Chick, a chicken. Fueled by nothing but revenge. The other farm animals have enjoyed their unwelcome stay for far too long. Farmer Jimmy "Joe" Jones death will not go uncalled for. John Chick will hobble, squawk, and shoot(time) through to see it the only way it was meant to be. It is now the time, more than ever before, to be thinking with time. And you can play with a Gamepad!
